name: Parallels (itch)
description:
Tired of hardcore platformers? Well here are two. In one game.

Features:
  • Control two players at once! Im sure that wont be annoying.
  • Explosions! Cuz you know. Explosions.
  • Blocks, that you can magically control with the "Z" button.
  • Switch witch player you control directly with "X".
  • The lovely sound of silence.

This game was made for LowRezJam 2017.

Any feedback is highly appreciated!
